term.title: addition

item.text: Refers to addition reaction or addition transformation.
Loosely, the formation of an adduct. (For an example, see Lewis acid.)

term.sources: 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' Muller, P.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1994 66(5) 1077
